strings.SS2_ENGINEER_LASERFOCUS_DESC: Release two beams of energy for <style=cIsDamage>2x150% damage</style>. Damage <style=cIsDamage>increases</style> the <style=cIsUtility>longer a target is focused upon</style>.
strings.SS2_ENGINEER_RAPIDDISPLACEMENT_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Move forward</style>, pushing any entities in the way for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>.
